law.catch_line: Third-party administrator to administer Kentucky Access -- Selection and duties -- Reimbursement for expenses.

text.section: The department may contract with the third-party administrator for a period of four (4) years with an option for a two (2) year extension as approved by the department on a year-by-year contract basis. At least one (1) year prior to the expiration of the third-party administratorâ€™s contract, the department may solicit third-party administrators, including the current third-party administrator, to submit bids to serve as the third-party administrator for the succeeding four (4) year period.
The third-party administrator shall be paid for necessary and reasonable expenses, as provided in the contract between the department and the third-party administrator.

law.history: Amended 2010 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 1278, effective July 15, 2010. -- Created 2000 Ky. Acts ch. 476, sec. 6, effective July 14, 2000.
